Package battleship2000.programlogic.domain.ship

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Hittable
    An interface implemented by all the Ship classes in the game either directly or by inheritance.
    Movable
    An interface implemented by all the Ship classes in the game either directly or by inheritance.
    Turnable
    Every class implementing this interface must provide for methods to turn the object both clockwise and counter clockwise.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Aircarrier
    One of the five standard specialized versions of the Ship class in the game.
    CannonShip
    One of the five standard specialized versions of the Ship class in the game.
    Commander
    One of the five standard specialized versions of the Ship class in the game.
    MissileShip
    One of the five standard specialized versions of the Ship class in the game.
    Ship
    A class that defines the size, name heading, capabilities and other attributes of the ships used in the game.
    ShipPart
    The manifestation of a Ship in the game is a series of ShipParts that can be placed in Squares of a Table.
    Submarine
    One of the five standard specialized versions of the Ship class in the game.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Direction
    An enum type used to store and retrieve the degree when turned to a certain direction and distances as x- and y-coordinates when moved to a certain direction.
    InLine
    An enum type used together with the Direction enum type to define whether a Direction is horizontal, vertical or neither.
    ShipType
    The ShipType enumerator is used to pass different ship types from the abstract Rules class to the CreateGame control class used to create a new game.
